fields.Title of Presentation: Report on apolar ideals of powers of power sums and of general hyperplane arrangements
fields.Conference/Meeting Name: AMS 2023 Fall Central Sectional Meeting, AMS Special Session on Varieties with unexpected hypersurfaces, geproci sets and their interactions
fields.Description/Abstract: I will report on two ongoing projects on apolar ideals. In joint work with Max Sullivan, as part of his master’s thesis, we study the apolar ideal of a power of a power sum symmetric polynomial. We determine the initial degree of the ideal in some cases, and conjecture that the result holds in all cases. In joint work with Jarosław Buczyński and Alexander Woo we study the apolar ideal of a general hyperplane arrangement. Results include a combinatorial description of at least some of the minimal generators.
